description: Gets details and status of a phone number that's claimed to your Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group.

parameters.name: PhoneNumberId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the phone number.

nested_items.name: ClaimedPhoneNumberSummary
nested_items.description: Information about a phone number that's been claimed to your Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumberId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the phone number.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumberArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the phone number.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number. Phone numbers are formatted [+] [country code] [subscriber number including area code].

nested_items.name: PhoneNumberDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the phone number.

nested_items.name: TargetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for Amazon Connect instances or traffic distribution groups that phone number inbound traffic is routed through.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance that phone numbers are claimed to. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumberStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the phone number.
CLAIMED means the previous ClaimPhoneNumber or UpdatePhoneNumber operation succeeded.

IN_PROGRESS means a ClaimPhoneNumber, UpdatePhoneNumber, or UpdatePhoneNumberMetadata operation is still in progress and has not yet completed. You can call DescribePhoneNumber at a later time to verify if the previous operation has completed.

FAILED indicates that the previous ClaimPhoneNumber or UpdatePhoneNumber operation has failed. It will include a message indicating the failure reason. A common reason for a failure may be that the TargetArn value you are claiming or updating a phone number to has reached its limit of total claimed numbers. If you received a FAILED status from a ClaimPhoneNumber API call, you have one day to retry claiming the phone number before the number is released back to the inventory for other customers to claim.

nested_items.name: SourcePhoneNumberArn
nested_items.description: The claimed phone number ARN that was previously imported from the external service, such as Amazon Web Services End User Messaging. If it is from Amazon Web Services End User Messaging, it looks like the ARN of the phone number that was imported from Amazon Web Services End User Messaging.
